kesewethath indiyawa ha chinaya athara tibetaya ha dalayilamata rakawaranaya dima sambandhayen athiwa thibu deshapalana aarowa nisath bandaranayaka palana yuga thulin chinaya ha lankawa athara unusum deshapalana, aarthika (uda: rabar-sahal giwisuma) ha sanskruthika bandimak athiwa thibuna bawinuth, indiyawe gahatawalata bandunwemin siti lankawata chinaya haki pamana udawkala. 1982 janadhipathiwaranayata idiripathwu rohana wijewira athulu jawipe 13ne politibiyurowa 1986 wanawita wishwawidyalawala anek siyalu shishyawyapara dadi lesa mardhanaya kota siya balaya pathuragena sitiya.

“prawin kumarta hethu dakwana lesata danwa lipiyak krikat mandalaya nikuth kara thiyenawa.langadi aarambha wana anthar prantha wije hasare kusalana tharagawalata sahabhagi wimada ohuta thahanam kara thibenawa” indiya krikat palaka mandalaye lekam sanje jagdel niwedanayak nikuth karamin kiya sitiyeya.oo.en.ji.si. kandayamata krida karamin sitiyadi kumar keti panduwak yawimen pasuwa inkam taks kandayame pithikaru ajith argal ta bana wadunu siddhiya pilibandawa krikat mandalaye winaya kamituwa thawamath parikshana pawathwamin siti.ema panduwe nithyanukulabhawaya pilibandawa pithikaru tharaga winisuruwangen wimasa balu awasthawedi kopawishta wu kumar parusha wachanawalin bana wadi athi athara me hethuwen siddhiya tharaga thiraka dhananje sin hamuwata gena eemata tharaga winisuruwanta siduwi thibe.
